name: My Pet Gleep Glopp
description:
It's your very own pet Gleep Glopp! Hatch it from the egg with love so you can do all sorts of activities like playing dress up and eating apples!

This was a short game I made in 4 days while on break from work so please enjoy and pet some Gleep Glopps!

Music by JoeyFunWithMusic - Tamatown Theme Cover (Korg M01D)
